include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})

)

add_library(gnuradio-dvbs2mod SHARED ${dvbs2mod_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-dvbs2mod ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
